title: Aw Lalpa min lawmin
lyrics:
Aw Lalpa, min lawmin,
Ka lamah lo eng la,
Ka sualnate min ngaidam la,
Ka bo ka pil hma hian.
Luikawr thim chu ka hlau lo vang a,
Thihna min hnaih lai hian;
Chu luikawr chu min hruai kai la,
A hlauhawmna berte pawh chu,
Nangin i hneh zo ta.

Thihna ata ka tlan,
I khawngaih kulhpuiah;
Nang zui vangin leido zawng zawng,
A reh zo dawn ta a,
I hausakna thilte zawng zawng,
Tunah ka tem tan ta;
A ni a lo thleng thuai ang a,
Ka thlarau van sangah khianin
A chawl kumkhua tawh ang a.

Khawvel hrehawmah hian,
Lungngaihna leh buaina;
Thihna thlaphannaah pawh hian,
Engkim tuar mah ila.
I hmangaih ro bawm hawn hunah,
Chatuana a zual dawn vangin,
A pawi lo ve, a ropuina,
Chuan min en avangin.
